mapper.sql: select FLM.*, ACF.PERSONAJ as PERSONAJ, (select ATA.URL from ATASAMENT ATA where ATA.ID_DOCUMENT = FLM.ID_DOCUMENT and rownum = 1) as ATA_URL
from FILM FLM left join DOCUMENT DOC on FLM.ID_DOCUMENT = DOC.ID left join ACTOR_FILM ACF on FLM.ID = ACF.ID_FILM left join FAVORIT FAV on FLM.ID = FAV.ID_FILM
